resources.string:
Do you have any symptom of illness such as: 
 A.) Cough 
 B.) Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing 
 C.) Fever 
 D.) Chills/repeated shaking with chills 
 E.) Muscle pain 
 F.) Headache 
 G.) Sore throat 
 H.) New loss of taste or smell
Have you had any contact with anyone with fever, cough, colds or sore throat in the past two weeks?
Have you travelled outside the Philippines in then last 14 days?
Have you travelled in any NCR aside from your home?

I hereby authorize Glory in the Highest Christian Ministry to collect and process the data indicated herein for the purpose of effecting control of the COVID-19 infection. I understand that my personal information is protected by RA 10123, Data Privacy Act of 2012 and that I am required by RA 11459 Bayanihan to heal as One Act to provide truthful information.
